items.content_html: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.
items.title: observerly/astrometry: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.

items.content_html: Spotify Lite is a lightweight music player app that offers core Spotify features with a simplified, responsive design. Users can browse songs and albums, manage playback with play, pause, next, and previous buttons, and enjoy automatic song transitions. It’s built with React.js and Tailwind CSS for optimal performance and user experience.
items.title: raajuukumaran/Spotify-Lite: Spotify Lite is a lightweight music player app that offers core Spotify features with a simplified, responsive design. Users can browse songs and albums, manage playback with play, pause, next, and previous buttons, and enjoy automatic song transitions. It’s built with React.js and Tailwind CSS for optimal performance and user experience.
